column2: "In a short while, we'll be battling the Crimson Evil Dragon. It has already awakened, so expect a fierce fight and please be careful!"
"We'll be receiving assistance from the Sword Maiden Alisa and the Laconium Sword's power. We will not lose!"

"We have confirmed that the Evil Dragon
that was sealed from within the ruins of
Cuent Castle, has resurrected itself.

Using the Laconium Sword, work with
Alisa to defeat this Evil Dragon!
――――――――――――――――――――
Damage Limit / 999999
Failure Conditions / Time limit runs out "
